body.name: LG 38WR85QC-W 38 inch Curved UltraWide WQHD Nano IPS VESADisplayHDR 600 144Hz 1ms USB Type-C 90W Computer Monitor NVIDIA G-SYNC AMD FreeSync Premium Pro HDMI DisplayPort Tilt/Height/Swivel Stand White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 10 mins
features: WQHD+ (3840x1600) Curved (2300R) - The 38 inch 21:9 UltraWide WQHD+ (3840 x 1600) curved monitor is great for work. The widescreen allows you to see everything you're working on, with multiple windows open, all on one screen.

Nano IPS with up to DCI-P3 98% - With Nano IPS and support for up to 98% coverage of the DCI-P3 color gamut on the nigh-resolution WQHD+ (3840x1600) display you can experience a wide color spectrum and detailed color contrast.
VESA DisplayHDR 600 - This UltraWide display supports VESA DisplayHDR 600 delivering dynamic contrast and brightness on the WQHD+ display.

Picture in Picture / Picture by Picture - OnScreen Control supports both Picture-in-Picture (PiP) and Picture-by-Picture (PbP) allowing you to configure your monitor to show content from two separate input sources. Play, watch, stream or work from multiple input sources at the same time, on one screen.

144HZ refresh rate, 1ms (GtG) response time - Whether this UltaWide is connected to a PC or a next gen gaming console, the display supports ultra-smooth, virtually tear-free gaming with up to 144Hz refresh rate and 1ms (GtG) response time.

NVIDIA G-SYNC Compatible - Officially validated by NVIDIA as G-SYNC Compatible. That translates to faster, smoother gaming that's been tested to reduce screen tearing and stutter. Never miss a frame of the action as you clinch your victories.

AMD FreeSync Premium Pro - AMD FreeSync Premium Pro equips serious gamers with a fluid, virtually tear-free gaming experience. With at least 120hz refresh rate at minimum FHD resolution and low latency gameplay, you'll never miss a frame of the action as you play at peak performance.
Stereo Speaker with Waves MaxxAudio (7Wx2) - Make some noise with built-in 7W stereo speakers equipped with Waves MaxxAudio, and make your games and movies come to life with bigger and bolder sound.
Ergonomic Design - The ergonomic stand makes it easy to flexibly adjust the height, tilt, and swivel of the screen in the optimal position for you.

USB Type-C & LAN Ports - Make the most of your productivity with a monitor featuring RJ45 (LAN port) for wired Ethernet. The USB Type-C port supports connection to various devices, data transfer, and up to 90W of power delivery via only a single cable.
body.description: 38" Curved UltraWide™ WQHD Nano IPS VESA DisplayHDR 600 144Hz USB Type-C 90W Monitor with NVIDIA® G-SYNC® Compatible

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WQHD+ (3840x1600) Curved The UltraWide QHD+ (3840x1600) screen with 2300R curvature and a 3-side borderless design is ideal for multitasking, as it can display multiple programs at once. Nano IPS with DCI-P3 With Nano IPS and support for DCI-P3 98% (Typ.) color gamut on the high-resolution WQHD+ (3840x1600) display, you can experience a wide color spectrum and detailed color and contrast. VESA DisplayHDR 600 Featuring VESA DisplayHDR 600, this monitor offers a wide range of brightness and contrast for an immersive experience when playing the latest HDR games, watching movies, and viewing pictures.

Multi devices, one monitor The dual controller helps to work through a single monitor with two computers and transfer files to either computer. Also, the built-in KVM feature allows you to control both computers with a single keyboard and mouse.

Picture by Picture/Picture in Picture Streamline your multitasking by making use of Picture-by-Picture and Picture-in-Picture to connect multiple devices, split your screen, or float a smaller window over your main window. LG Switch App LG Switch app helps to optimize the monitor to your work and life. You can readily divide the whole display up to 6, change the theme design, or even launch a video call platform with a mapped hotkey.

144Hz Refresh Rate, 1ms (GtG) Response Time A fast 1ms (GtG) IPS response time and 144Hz refresh rate make image frames appear smoothly, it helps gamers quickly see the next frame and respond rapidly to opponents while aiming at targets easily. NVIDIA G-Sync Compatible Game seamlessly with NVIDIA-tested and verified G-SYNC Compatible, with less tears for even more victories. AMD FreeSync Premium Pro Enjoy uninterrupted gameplay with significantly reduced distractions such as tearing, stuttering, or jittering. Built-In Speakers with MaxxAudio Built-in 7W x 2ch speakers delivers clear sound without additional peripherals, providing more space on your desk for your comfort and needs.

USB Type C, RJ45 Make the most of your productivity with a monitor featuring RJ45 (LAN port) for wired Ethernet. The USB Type-C port supports connection to various devices, data transfer, and ~90W power delivery. Supported Ports USB 3.0 Upstream, 4 x USB Downstream2 x USB Type-CLAN2 x HDMIDisplay Port
Ergonomic Design Get your perfect viewing angle with the ergonomically designed stand: adjust the height, tilt, and swivel easily to fine the position that fits you best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and Excellent Monitor for Work and Gaming
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this monitor for a month now and I'm really happy with it. The picture quality is excellent, with vivid colors and sharp images. What I like most is that it has a feature that allows me to connect both my Macbook and PC at the same time, using a USB-C cable for the MacBook and a display port for the PC. It also has a KVM switch built in, which means I can use the same keyboard, mouse and headphones for both computers without needing an external switch.For Mac users, I recommend installing BetterDisplay to improve the text quality as the MacBook's PPI is higher compared to the monitor. It's a free download, so no need to worry about any extra costs.The only thing I wish they had was this monitor in black, but overall, I don't have any other complaints. It's a great monitor that I'd recommend to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great monitor, Great Picture Quality, The best part is the KVM build it. No need to switch between different keyboards or mice just one cable to rule them all.
